title: Shop Official Formula E Merchandise | Official FIA Formula E Store
content: Join Formula E It's quick, easy and free to sign up You'll get access to:                                     News. Analysis. Stay up-to-date with alerts so you don't miss a moment of the action Sign up today to get the latest news and exclusive content from on-and-off the track Formula E aspires to accelerate change towards an electric future, one race and one city at a time. Using the spectacle of world class sport, we are sending a powerful and meaningful message to help alter perceptions and speed-up the switch to electric mobility.   Hi, we noticed you’re not in United Kingdom.
